showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ !  Had truck towed to shop was waiting on another driver from my company to get me so can go get loaner truck, paid for shower, laundry, food after sitting in driver's lounge for 4 hours night employee came and told me had to leave . They ‚Ä¶
Shower was clean and water pressure was great and great hot water . Decent sized showers too, worth a wait if you have to wait
This morning I toke a  shower at this location, ‚Ä¶
Took my first shower ever on the road here & it was amazing!!! If you need a shower, just do it - you‚Äôll feel like a million bucks!!!

‚Ä¶ CLEAN AND HAS LOTS OF FREE PARKING AND THE WALMART NECT DOOR ALSO HAS AT LEAST 8 SEMI TRUCK LABLED PARKING SPOTS!! IT'S LITERALLY A LITTLE WALK OUT PILOTS LOT INTO WALMARTS SO YOU ARE STILL CLOSE ENOUGH TO SHOWER.  IT'S BIGGER THAT IT LOOKS

Dirty peg on shower 3 never being cleaned

‚Ä¶ 5. For some reason they wouldn't  put yellow bags over the nozzles. Kiosk was out of paper. Lottery machine out of order. Shower smelled like a backed up septic tank. And the parking lot sucks for trucks. One driveway in and out. Other than ‚Ä¶

This is a new Pilot and very clean. The shower announcing computer was a little confused as someone was already in my assigned shower. However, no worry! The staff figured it out immediately and offered an extra towel for my long hair ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: I stoped for a shower, but their point reader was down( thats what they said) I fuel at Loves most of the time, I got plenty of showers, but they said I couldn‚Äôt shower because there was no way for the to redeem my shower, and I don‚Äôt have ‚Ä¶

I was completely blown away by the manager, Taniya, today when I stopped in for a shower. Idk about the men but most of us ladies require a fan when we get out of a hot shower but there wasn‚Äôt one in my otherwise very clean shower. When I ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Above and beyond to help me out as always. The loves shower ‚Ä¶
6/22/23 -Checked in for shower on App. After waiting for 30 mins it was cancelled. When I checked with the employee she was extremely rude. Said showers were being used as restrooms. ‚Ä¶

This truckstop has gone downhill. They turn off showers if they feel too busy to clean. They ran out of bread at the Subway, and seemed to have plenty of staff. Seems like they don't plan correctly,  or like they just don't care. This is ‚Ä¶

Employee walked in while my girl and I were showering.  You'd think it's common sense that if you have 10 shower doors, each a foot away from the next one, all in one empty hallway that echoes that knocking off on a door not make it clear ‚Ä¶

Extremely nice people working. Cleanliness and maintenance not up to Love's standards. 3 showers. One out of order, unknown reason. Second, door falling off per clerk. Third, working, sort of. Turned water on, shower head fell off and water ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Truckers: Parking if you get here early enough is easy in and out, wide spaces. Use caution when turning in/out of the truck lot, exits onto the main thoroughfare. Shower was clean, hot and had extremely good water pressure.

My husband and I waited at the feel desk to get a shower until finally a young lady said they would help us at the other side. If you plan to shower here check your shower first. Our trashcan was full of someone's hair cut dirty q-tips, and ‚Ä¶

I am a female passenger of a truck driver and clean showers is big thing for me and my shower number 1 (they have 3 showers) was great! Very clean and looked new and remodeled which is a big deal BUT shower number 3 my bf used wasn't as ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText:
No parking üÖøÔ∏è when I visited. Got here 2late. üòÇ
Hot ü•µ coffee ‚òïÔ∏è & chilled creamer.
Restroom üöΩ Mos Def needed some attention but all employees were busy keeping ‚Ä¶
Nice stopping place! Decent pricing on gas. No alternative fuels. Fueling area was clean, well stocked with paper towels and window washing supplies. ‚Ä¶

This is a truck stop that has a lot of stuff to offer, even though it is a smaller Loves. It has showers, car equipment, a subway.
Above average stop, but bathrooms were not clean and the stall doors did not lock.
Gas station is convenient and clean. Plenty of snacks, drinks and other convenience goods. ‚Ä¶
Good clean bathrooms. Plus they put candy bars in the fridge, 5 stars, hell yeah

This is a nice little stop for Texas. Bathrooms are roomy and functional. It has an unusual sonic setup. There is a life-size model of a cowboy on a horse probably for photos. The ordering system seems to be a call in style with phones and menus at the booths. As well as a phone by an express window.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ , Rip Griffin travel center. All 3 names because no one wants to claim responsibility for this disaster. I mean they have a shower curtain as a door in the men's room. Good thing it's only the handicap stall. Keep driving don't stop! 28 ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Now they have the restrooms torn apart and don't have any clearly marked restrooms. When we asked an employee about it he mumbled something about using the showers and didn't say anything else. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ On the negative side, the shower was probably the worst I've had yet. The pressure was so weak that I kept bumping my forehead on the shower knob. When anyone in another shower flushed the toilet, the shower would stop for a second or two, ‚Ä¶
I stopped here to do our 10 hour rest. Shower and toilet was clean and good pressure. Subway is open unfortunately not lately. Small but very Nice truck stop
My first time here. It's an easy off & easy on the HWY. I found the shower was clean. And I got a bite at Krispy Krunchy Chicken üçó and it was good üòä ‚Ä¶

Pretty nice truck stop
Very quiet at night
They cold beer
Clean shower and restrooms.
Second time stopping to shower and the ladies are always friendly and helpful! Wish all the pilots where as clean and friendly!

showerReviews.reviewText: Well other than being told I can't hang around there pay to shower$10 after I cleaned it first. I'm a Retired Trucker on early retirement due to a tragic accident just getting by and I can't use the Truckers Lounge? That grumpy old lady who ‚Ä¶
Terrible showers.  Dirty toilet paper all over. Dirt on the floor bugs in the shower curtain. Absolutely disgusting.  Fuel pump hoses are to short also
Nice friendly staff, horrible shower rooms.

Paid $10 for a dirty shower, towels and wash Rags from previous shower guest still in there and their smeared poop remnants. Hot dogs as hard has rocks, all the food looked like it had been sitting there too long. Yuck keep driving

I'm a trucker. They say you get a free shower when you fuel. I fueled , than parked them went to get shower. Omg, I had to shop around for  a hotel for about $60 and use their shower. The two showers were filthy and nasty. These dam people ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I love walking into a gas station and it smells like cinnamon rolls. Bathrooms are consistently decent. Make sure to get the Pilot app for deals.

Hands down one of the nicest and cleanest public bathrooms we stopped at, and it was especially appreciated in the middle of the night with a 7 hour drive. The inside is very nice, new, bright and clean. Make this your place to stop for a drink and a pee break!
Could be just a night crew thing, but they all nice and helpful, keep the place clean as should. Recommend stopping here on your travels. 7/24/25 10:50pm üëç ‚Ä¶

By far the worst Pilot I've ever visited. My friend and I (both backpackers) stopped here in the morning for the usual restroom break and breakfast. The heavyset manager woman called the cops on us saying that we were trespassing and had no ‚Ä¶

That pilot travel center is really had a good location right n it‚Äôs right on the road. You will get A good size parking lot and super clean classrooms. Laundry and driver Lodge. For food they have a pizza and Arby‚Äôs addition to that Walmart ‚Ä¶

One of the best Pilot travel centers I've visited twice now on the road while truck driving. Always clean, mostly everyone is friendly. Safer than most communities and there's a man named Donald in there. Say hello to him, he's the kindest ‚Ä¶
Very clean, very friendly travel stop with bathrooms right at the front door and lots of options including outdoor areas for pet stops and an Arby's drive thru and walk up. Highly recommended.

Truly pathetic!!  Had truck towed to shop was waiting on another driver from my company to get me so can go get loaner truck, paid for shower, laundry, food after sitting in driver's lounge for 4 hours night employee came and told me had to ‚Ä¶
Clean place. Had a spot to take my doggy out, and self checkout so the line was nonexistant.
Shower was clean and water pressure was great and great hot water . Decent sized showers too, worth a wait if you have to wait

locations.content: Russell's Truck & Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This place has everything a traveler needs. Showers that are squeaky clean with a sink toilet and shower in each room, a diner with really good Mexican and American food, a market for groceries, and wait for it... even a car musuem. And the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Fifth - THE SHOWERS.  As a woman, I really appreciate showers that are actually CLEAN.  And not a man‚Äôs version of clean. üòÇüôà When the tile grout is clean and the drains aren‚Äôt gunky, the vents aren‚Äôt caked in dust and the toilet bowl ( ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ your legs TONS of route66 souvenirs Millions of dollars worth of priceless antique cars and trucks and motorcycles and MANY MANY other artifacts and collectibles in their walk thru museum and really big clean bathrooms with shower too

Cool little place to stop and grab a bite to eat. They have lots of trucker necessities and for $12 you can have a hot shower with a clean towel. They have lots of unique nick nacks and lots of cool different food items for your hangrey ‚Ä¶
I love this truck stop! It has all kinds of eats and drinks,clean bathrooms. Truckers shower, subway, nice friendly staff and a free yes I said free car museum!
Love the museum. Took a shower here . Was great as well . Plenty of parking .
Shower was nice but pumps were down for my hour visit. I was very low on def but had to press on.

Wonderful Hot shower with a rain shower head. And fantastic soft water..I‚Äôve been out west for awhile and it‚Äôs been like trying to get suds from a stone everywhere I shower! $12 shower/$5 deposit for a plush towel. So clean too, I even ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I came back in the next morning, after sleeping, to get a shower and there was nothing on my rewards card. When I gave Diane all my info she still couldn't find my payment and started getting rude by telling me "I don't know what to tell ‚Ä¶

Lots of parking for semi truck, showers were wonderful, huge shower room with great big fluffy towels, everyone that works there is super friendly and helpful , tire shop was great too, we had to get 2 trailer tires replaced and they were ‚Ä¶
